1: <pb/>A 'a pecti', til wal yoclemal tas yutjnac Dios yaln 'a eb' qui mam quichmec. Til wal 'ejm sc'anlb'ejnac eb' schecab'.
2: Ax 'a jun slajb' tiempoal tic, atn wal Yunnal sc'anlb'ej yic yaln 'ayn̈ec. A yet' Yunnal tic sb'ojnac yolyib'n̈q'uinal, yet' smasnil tas 'ay 'a 'a. Ax 'a Yunnal tic, ata ya'jnac smasnil tas yico'oc.
3: A tzch'oxn 'el swach'l Dios, yujto caw lajn swach'l yet'oc. Caw wal lajnn̈ej snab'en yet' Dios. Yujn̈ej spaxti Yunnal tic, wach'n̈j yec' smasnil tas, yujto a spaxti tic, caw niwn spoder. Ax yic xlajw yi'n can 'el qui mulec, 'ix 'at 'em wocn 'a swach' c'ab' Dios 'a satcha'an̈.
4: <pb/>A Yunnal Dios, yel xo wal niwn yel'ch 'ajnc 'a yib'n̈ eb' ángel. Yujto a jun sb'i 'ac'b'il yuj Smam 'a 'a, yel xo caw niwn yel'ch 'a yib'n̈ yic eb' ángel cha.
5: Man̈oc 'a junc ángel yaljnac Dios 'ixtic: <pb/><t>Ach tic, Wunnal ach. A 'a jun c'u tic, 'ix wac' checljoc 'eli, to Wunnal ach, xchi.</t> <pb/>A yic yaln Dios junx tic, man̈ yujoc junc ángel yalni, palta yuj Yunnal. Yaln 'ixtic: <pb/><t>An 'oj woch mamb'il-l 'a 'a, ax 'oj 'och 'unnab'ilal 'ayin, xchi.</t>
6: <pb/>A yic ya'n cot Dios jun c'otn̈ Yunnal 'a yolyib'n̈q'uinl tic, yaln yuj 'ixtic: <pb/><t>Ya' cab' 'ejm sb'a smasnil eb' wángel 'a 'a, xchi.</t>
7: <pb/>Yuj cha, yaln pax Dios yab'xil eb' ángel cha, tas tz'aj eb' yuj Yunnal. Yaln yuj eb' 'ixtic: <pb/><t>A eb' yángel, tzlaj ya'ch eb' 'ic'al, ax eb' tz'a'w servil 'a 'a, tzlaj ya'ch pax eb' snich c'aq'uil, xchi.</t>
8: <pb/>Palta 'ixtc tzyal junx yab'xil Yunnal Dios tic: <pb/><t>Ach Dios, Reych 'a smasnil tiempo. Yajl ach, tojln̈ej tzotj a b'eyc'ojlwi.</t>
9: <t>Tza chamc'ojlej tas tojol, ax maysch'olnil, caw yajb'il 'el o'oj. Yuj cha, ach si'n 'elt Dios, atn jun a Diosal. 'Ix yac' jun a tzaljc'ojlal to 'ec'b'al 'a yib'n̈ yic eb' et yajlil, xchi 'a Ch'an̈ U'un̈.</t>
10: <pb/>Tzyaln pax 'ixtic: <pb/><t>Ach Cajlil, a 'a yic tax x'el yich, ach a b'ojnac lum lum tic. Ach a b'ojnac pax satcha'an̈.</t>
11: <t>Smasnil jun tzo'n̈ a b'ojnac tic, 'oj lajwc 'eq'ui, palta ach xo, 'aych 'ec'n̈ej 'a smasnil tiempo. Smasnil jun tzo'n̈ tic, 'oj 'ichmaxc eb' 'icha pichul.</t>
12: <t>'Oj a chulb'ec'n 'icha junc nip. 'Oj a jelmtoc 'icha tzyac' junc 'anma tzjel-l yichm pichul. Palta ach xo, ajn̈j aj 'a smasnil tiempo. Ax a q'uinal, may b'a'n̈ 'oj lajwc 'eq'ui, xchi 'a Ch'an̈ U'un̈.</t>
13: <pb/>May junc ángel 'aj yaljnac pax Dios junx tic, 'icha 'ix yutj yaln 'a Yunnal. Yic yaln 'ixtic: <pb/><t>'Emn̈ wocn 'a in wach' c'ab', masnto 'oj can eb' tzchichn 'och 'aych 'a yaln̈ wu'uj, xchi.</t>
14: <pb/>Palta ax eb' ángel chi smasnil, espíritun̈ej eb', ya'mal servil Dios yaj eb'. Checb'il cot eb', yic tzwul colwjc eb' 'ayn̈ an̈ 'oj qui chac qui colnb'il 'a jun 'ejmn̈ej.
